articles.content: I must admit that part of me, the journalistic part, cant wait for Liz Truss to become prime minister. As we hacks always say, she makes for good copy. As we also say nowadays, shes good for traffic.… [+7121 chars]

articles.author: Adam Forrest
articles.title: Boris Johnson could face by-election if suspended by Partygate inquiry, Commons Speaker confirms
articles.description: Suspension would fall within Recall of MPs Act, according to Sir Lindsay Hoyle
articles.content:
Boris Johnson could face a recall petition which could trigger a by-election if he is suspended by MPs investigating whether he lied over Partygate, the Commons Speaker Sir Lindsay Hoyle confirmed.
